content.rendered:
Increase your security with EMV
merchant services in Los Angeles

Prevent chargebacks and identity theft when processing
in-person transactions with EMV terminals.
Free Quote
Contact Sales

EMV Liability Shift

Issuers become liable for disputes when you use EMV technology.

Fraud Protection

Chip technology is the
global standard for fraud protection

Smart Security

EMV chips talk to your terminal using sophisticated encryption. 

Customer Convenience

Your customers can pay quickly, knowing their data is secure. 

There's no better time than now to upgrade to EMV payment processing!

Paying with an EMV chip is more secure than paying with an older card that only features a magnetic stripe. The payment data is encrypted, which prevents fraud when paying at a terminal. The chip is also extremely difficult to clone, adding another layer of security.

There’s no better time than now to upgrade to an EMV chip card reader!

Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers top-of-the-line EMV chip card processing devices. Our experts can help you integrate your new equipment into your current system so there’s no interruption in your payment processing. The only difference: your business will be able to process EMV’s secure payments, reducing fraud and chargebacks!

01 02

Merchant Services in
Los Angeles

Whether you are processing payments in-store, online, or keyed in a virtual terminal, you’ll get the best rates with Dynamic Merchant Solutions.
Get Your Custom Rate
No application or setup fees
No hidden fees
24/7 customer services
In-Person (Average)
1.92%+8¢
Average PIN-Debit Rate 0.91% +8¢

Keyed & Online (Average)

2.38%+25¢

What Our Clients Say
About Dynamic Merchant Solutions.

We’re a leading merchant services company in Los Angeles

Maria Mak

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

Mikaela Stone

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

Chris Mathew

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

Start Selling with

Dynamic Merchant
Solutions.

Request a free quote from a top merchant payment
service in Los Angeles.

Apply now and get
approved as soon as 24
hours.




    Step 1

    Contact our expert sales team to get approved and determine your industry-low rates.

    Step 2

    Work with our experts to identify the type of payment methods, software, and hardware you need for your business.

    Step 3

    Incorporate your new payment methods into your existing business and start selling.
